FAQ / Wave 1 / Characters /
View On FortressMaximus.io

Cliffjumper - Renegade Warrior

  1. What happens if one of my characters that’s a Car while in alt mode but not in bot mode is KO’d
    while it’s in bot mode?     [Source: WotC]
    Characters are put in the KO area in the same mode they were in on the battlefield. In that case, the
    KO’d character isn’t a Car and won’t add to Cliffjumper’s bonus.
  2. Does transforming a Car-mode character in the KO pile activate Cliffjumper's alternate mode ability? [Source: WotC]
    Not unless specifically stated. K.O.’d characters flipping wont trigger any abilities unless otherwise stated.
  3. Say I have Autobot Hot Rod (Sentinel) in the KO area and Cliffjumper in play in alt mode. When I flip Hot Rod in the KO area to bot mode, does it trigger Cliffjumper’s ability to draw a card? Since Cliffjumper’s ability doesn’t stipulate the Car has to be in play, it would seem like this would be valid, right? [Source: WotC]
    No. Card abilities do not affect and are not affected by cards in the KO area unless specifically stated on the card.
  4. If I flip Sunstreaker in KO area to alt mode to draw a card, would that still trigger Cliffjumper’s alt mode skill to draw a card? [Source: WotC]
    No. Abilities only look at things on the battlefield unless specifically stated.
  5. Which cards do not 'work' on a character in Body mode? [Source: Community]
    The following cards apply to Bot mode and thus will not affect an enemy character in its Body mode:
    - Cornered!
    - Marksmanship
    The following cards apply to Bot mode and thus will not affect one of your characters in its Body mode:
    - Cliffjumper - Renegade Warrior's Alt mode ability
    - Conversion Expertise (still provides Tough 1 in Alt mode)
    - Escape Route
    - Hit and Run
    - Hunker Down (still upgrades with Armor if the character with Body mode is currently a Tank)
    - Pop a Wheelie (if there was a Motorcycle with a Body mode, it would not flip)
    - Roll Out!
    - Start Your Engines (still untaps if the character with Body mode is currently a Car)
    - Swerve
    - Unconventional Flying Object
